titleStmt.title: SII 7.1040: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 1040. (A.R. No. 407 of 1902). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . pūmaruviya tirumātum puvimātum jayamā
tum nāmaruviya kalaimātum pukaḻmātum nayantu pulka Arumaṟai
viti neṟiyaṉaittun taḻaippa varumuṟai Urimai maṇimuṭi cūṭit tiṅka
ḷ veṇkuṭait ticaik(k)eḷi ṟeṭṭum taṅku taṉikkūṭan tānena vi
ḷaṅka karuṅkalippaṭṭiyaic ceṅkol turappa Oruṅkati rāḷi puli
vaḷart tuṭaṉvara villavar Iraṭṭar miṉavar ciṅkaḷar pallavar nutaliya
r pārttivar paṇiya kaṟpil maṇṇakam puṇarntu cempoṉ virasiṁ
hāsanattu puvana muḻutuṭaiyāḷoṭum viṟṟiruntaruḷiya kopparakesa
ripatmarāna tripuvanaccakkaravattikaḷ śrīrājarājadevaṟku yāṇṭu Āṟāvatu ku
Mbhanāyaṟṟu Aparapakṣattu prathamaiyum viyāḻakkiḻamaiyum peṟṟa makattu nāḷ
nittavino tavaḷanāṭṭu viracoḻavaḷanāṭṭu brahmadeyam tribhuvanamahādeviccaruppetimaṅkalattup pe
ruṅkuṟi mahāsabhaiyom Uṭaiyār tirukkiḷāvuṭaiyār koyilil Āticaṇṭeśvaradevaṟku
tirununtāviḷakkuppuṟamākavum Ittevar tirunāṭkaḷil yākamaṇṭapattu tevar Eḻunta
ruḷi Irukka Addhyayanampaṇṇuvāṟkum Ittevar tiruccāntu cāttumpotu puṇṇiyāka
mpaṇṇavum Addhyayana mpaṇṇukaikkum pāṇṭikulācanivaḷanāṭṭu Āṟkāṭṭukkūṟṟattu
Aḻicukuṭaiyān kunikkumpirān tirunaṭampurintāṉ perumarutūr Aḻakiyamaṇavāḷan
vināyakapaṭṭanpakkal vilaikoṇṭu Uṭaiyanāṉa nilamāvatu kaucalaivatikku meṟku kaṅ
kaikoṇṭacoḻavāykkālukku vaṭakku munṟāṅ kaṇṇāṟṟu nālān tuṇṭattu kiḻakkaṭaiya ni
lam Orumā Araikkāṇi nikki Itan meṟku nilam Orumā varaiyil meṟkaṭai
ya nilam kāṇi Araikkāṇi muntirikaiyil teṟkaṭaiya nilam kāṇi ni
kki Itan vaṭakku nattanilam muntirikaiyum Āṟāṅ kaṇṇāṟṟu munṟān tu
ṇṭattu kiḻakkaṭaiya nilam Orumā nikki Itan meṟku nilam Iraṇṭumāk kā
ṇiyum Āka viḷai nilamum nattamum nilam Iraṇṭumāk kāṇi muntirikai Innilam Iraṇṭumāk kāṇi munti
rikaiyum Ivvāticaṇṭeśvaradevar civanāmattināl tirununtāviḷak koṉṟukku tirununtāviḷak
kuppuṟamāka Innilam Iraṇṭumāk kāṇiyil kiḻakkaṭaiya nilam mākāṇiyume Itan meṟkaṭaiya Ittevar tirunāḷkaḷil yāka
maṇṭapattu tevar Eḻuntaruḷiirukka Addhyayana mpaṇṇavum puṇṇiyākampaṇṇavum Ittevar tiruccāntu cāttumpotu cuddhapu
ṇṇiyākampaṇṇavum perumpaṟṟappuliyūril Ātrayan nātan tevanāṉa vināyakapaṭṭaṟkum Ivan makane tuṭaṅki Avaṉvaḻi vanta vaṅkicattu teva
svammāka Iṟaiyiliceyta nilam Orumāvum Āka nilam Iraṇṭumāk kāṇiyum nattanilam muntirikaiyum Āka nilam Iraṇṭumāk kāṇi muntirikaiyum Innilam Iraṇṭumāk kāṇi
yum Iṟaiyiliceykaikku nammur veṭṭi yuḷḷiṭṭu veṇṭuvaṉaAvaiyiṟṟukkum sabhāviniyogattukkum Aḻicukuṭaiyān kunikkumpirān tirunaṭampurintāṉpakkal koṇṭa kācu patinaiñcukku
kkut tiṅkaḷ kālt tiramap palicai polivatākavum Ippalicaikkuc celavāka Innilam Innilam Iraṇṭumāk kāṇi muntirikaiyum Ippaṭiye Anupavikkap peṟuvārākavum Ikkācu patiṉaiñcu
kuṭaiyān kunikkumpirān tirunaṭampurintānpakkal koṇṭu Innilam Iraṇṭumāk kāṇi muntirikaiyum cantirātittavaṟ śāśvatikamāka Iṟaiyili Anupavikkappeṟuvārāka Ippaṭi I
ytukuṭuttom Uṭaiyār tirukkiḷāvuṭaiyār koyilil Āticaṇḍeśvaraṟku Ittribhuvanamāteviccaruppetimaṅkalattup peruṅkuṟi mahāsabhaiyom Innilam Iraṇṭumāk kāṇi muntirikai
vari peruvari Antarāyakkācum veṭṭi muṭṭaiyāḷum veḷḷānveṭṭiyum maṟṟum Eppoṟpaṭṭa tiruvācaṟponta kuṭimai kāṭṭuvārum kāṇpārum tiruvāṇai puvaṉamuḻutuṭaiyā rāṇai ciyājñai Enṟu sabhā
sabhaiyuḷḷiruntu paṇittār rājentracoḻaccerikku korovi Ayyappirāṉpaṭṭan paṇiyālum tripuvaṉamāteviccerikku kuravacari Agnijenmapaṭṭaṉpaṇiyālum Arumoḻitevaccerikku veṇ
māṇikkapaṭṭan paṇiyālum maturāntakaccerikku Araṇaippuṟattu nārāyaṇapaṭṭan paṇiyālum jaṉanātaccerikku kārampicceṭṭu kaṟkapocaṉ cikovin
tapaṭṭan paṇiyālum pavittiramāṇikkaccerikku vaṅkipurattuc cirāmapaṭṭan paṇiyālum paṇippaṇiyāl Ūṟkaṇakku Amuttiravalli Uṭaiyān Eḻuttu Ippaṭik kivai
kārampicceṭṭu mātavpaṭṭan Eḻuttu Ippaṭik kivai kaḷattū rāḷuṭaiyāṉpaṭṭan Eḻuttu Ippaṭik kivai veṇṇaikkuṟiccik karumāṇikkapaṭṭan Eḻuttu Ippaṭik ki
vai Acukūṟ cantirāparaṇapaṭṭan Eḻuttu Ippaṭik kivai kuravaceri Akkiceṉapaṭṭan Eḻuttu Ippaṭik kivai perumpāṇṭur nārāyaṇapaṭṭan Eḻuttu Ippaṭik kivai Acukū
rāṭkoṇṭanāyakapaṭṭan Eḻuttu Ippaṭik kivai vaṅkipuṟattuc cirāmapaṭṭan Eḻuttu Ippaṭik kivai vaṅkippuṟattu mātavapaṭṭasyapacumpuṟattu nārāyaṇapaṭṭasa
yiñjaikuṇṭū ruyyakkoṇṭārpaṭṭan sayiñjaikorovi Ayyapirān sayiñjai .
Digital edition of SII 7.1040 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
